name: Weight of Worlds
description:
Your planet is under attack by a barrage of worlds. Luckily, it's under the protection of a rudimentary yet effective planetary defence system.

You must balance the weight of the worlds on the defence system by:

  • Moving it right or left (default: A and D. Settings to rebind.)
  • Tilting the sides up and down (default: Mouse click right/left. Settings to rebind.)

Matching 3 worlds makes them miraculously disappear!

Whilst being the defender of the planet is not a winnable task, score enough points and you might make it on the leaderboard!

Made by hnuqweasd#3731, SarahSage7#9089, Sophiablabla#7563

Leaderboard powered by SilentWolf: https://silentwolf.com/
